import*as actionType from'./actionTypes';export var startRequest=function startRequest(){return{type:actionType.START_REQUEST};};export var successRequest=function successRequest(){return{type:actionType.SUCCESS_REQUEST};};export var failRequest=function failRequest(error){return{type:actionType.FAIL_REQUEST,error:error};};export var startMain=function startMain(){return{type:actionType.START_MAIN};};export var successMain=function successMain(letters,letterIndexs,allElements){return{type:actionType.SUCCESS_MAIN,letters:letters,letterIndexs:letterIndexs,allElements:allElements};};//  Get Data
export var getData=function getData(data){return{type:actionType.GET_IMAM_DATA,imamData:data,suras:data.suras.split(',')};};export var getServer=function getServer(server){return{type:actionType.GET_SERVER,server:server};};export var suraLink=function suraLink(link){return{type:actionType.SURA_LINK,link:link};};export var suraLinkRandom=function suraLinkRandom(randomNumber){return{type:actionType.SURA_LINK_RANDOM,number:randomNumber};};
